name: mood-tracker-backend
description: Backend API for Mood Tracker application

scripts.test:api: node src/server.js & echo $! > .pid && sleep 2 && curl -f http://localhost:8080/api/health && kill $(cat .pid)
scripts.test:series: node src/server.js & echo $! > .pid && sleep 2 && for i in 1 2 3 4 5 6 7; do case $i in 1|2) mood=3 ;; 3|4) mood=4 ;; 5|6) mood=5 ;; 7) mood=6 ;; esac; day=$(printf "2025-07-%02dT10:00:00+05:00" $i); curl -s -X POST http://localhost:8080/api/submit -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d "{\"timestamp\":\"$day\",\"mood\":$mood,\"energy\":4,\"anxiety\":2,\"irritability\":1,\"notes\":\"hypo d$i\"}" >/dev/null; done; kill $(cat .pid)

author: procop07
